Texto: 
leukokoria and abnormal fundoscopic examination
enucleation of right eye.
mass in posterior right globe.  
no involvement of optic nerve or contralateral eye.
retinoblastoma
retinoblastoma
detached retina
metastatic disease
1 y.o. boy with "yellow eye"
